mapper.sql: t.F_PID, T.F_LUCKDRAW_PID, T.F_LUCKDRAW_TYPE, T.F_PRIZE_TYPE, T.F_PRIZE_IMAGE, T.F_SLOT_PID, T.F_PRODUCT_PID, T.F_NUM, T.F_PHONE, T.F_SORT, T.F_C1, T.F_C2, T.F_C3, T.F_C4, T.F_C5, t.F_SYS_FLAG, t.F_REMARK, t.F_LAST_MODIFIER, t.F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, t.F_CREATOR, t.F_CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MARKET_LUCKDRAW_PRIZE ( F_PID, F_LUCKDRAW_PID, F_LUCKDRAW_TYPE, F_PRIZE_TYPE, F_PRIZE_IMAGE, F_PRODUCT_PID, F_NUM, F_SLOT_PID, F_PHONE, F_SORT, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{luckdraw_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{luckdraw_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prize_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prize_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{slot_pid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sysFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO T_MARKET_LUCKDRAW_PRIZE ( F_PID, F_LUCKDRAW_PID, F_LUCKDRAW_TYPE, F_PRIZE_TYPE, F_PRIZE_IMAGE, F_PRODUCT_PID, F_NUM, F_SLOT_PID, F_PHONE, F_SORT, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME )
SELECT #{entity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.luckdraw_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.luckdraw_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.prize_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.prize_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.product_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.num, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity.slot_pid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity.c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{entity.sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT t.*, p.F_PdName as F_PRODUCT_NAME, p.F_PdImgUrl as F_PRODUCT_IMGURL, d.f_name as F_PRODUCT_BRAND, s.F_SiCoilId as F_SLOT_COIL_ID FROM T_MARKET_LUCKDRAW_PRIZE T left join tproduct p on t.f_product_pid = p.id left join tslotinfo s on t.F_SLOT_PID = s.Id left join t_pub_dic d on p.F_PdBrandId = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag = '1'
order by t.F_SORT

SELECT t.*, p.F_PdName as F_PRODUCT_NAME, p.F_PdImgUrl as F_PRODUCT_IMGURL, s.F_SiCoilId as F_SLOT_COIL_ID FROM T_MARKET_LUCKDRAW_PRIZE T left join tproduct p on t.f_product_pid = p.id left join tslotinfo s on t.F_SLOT_PID = s.Id
order by t.F_SORT for update
